title: Affordable Housing – Rent Reduce – Essex Landing
posting_body: ['Essex Landing - Saugus MA', 'REDUCED PRICE: $1,619/Month ♦ 1-Bed/1-Bath ♦ 80% AMI', 'Please visit our website for income restrictions:', '<URL>', 'This is not a Lottery.', 'Essex Landing, Income Restricted Apartment Rentals, provides a unique village with exciting amenities and a nod to the rich history of both Saugus and Essex County.', 'The development overlooks dramatic views Boston and offers easy access to first-class retail along with many restaurant and bar options, dynamic fitness offerings, and ample outdoor space to run or walk your dog.', 'Amenities & Features', 'Controlled Access ♦ Video Patrol ♦', 'Furnished Units Available ♦', 'On-Site Retail ♦ Elevator ♦ Outdoor patio seating ♦', 'Location', '44 COLLINS AVENUE, SAUGUS, MA, USA', 'Actual floor plans of available vacancies may vary.', ' You will be provided the actual floor of the available apartment if we reach you on the waitlist.', 'Frequently Asked Questions:', '♦', 'Will the affordable units be able to rent parking?', ' If so, garage or off street and how much per month?', 'Not included in rent, additional monthly rental cost', '♦', 'What utilities are the renters responsible for?', 'Tenants are responsible for all utilities.', 'Additional Information', 'Maximum of 2 pets per unit.', 'There is a fee of:', 'Cat: $75 per month', 'Dog: $75 per month.', 'Breed restrictions apply.']
